}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "8WUSAC03.1A1G" and "WUSAC03" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The device is shown as using a ''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY85703-11 FEM.
The USB ID for this device would seem to be '''2001:3d02'''. {{See also|Alpha Networks}}
